name: Welcome Above
description: “Welcome Above” is a stylized VR-Flight experience that allows the players to enjoy the natural feeling of flying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible Additional Notes: HTC Vive + two Vive controllers / Oculus Rift + two Oculus Touch controllers / Windows Mixed Reality & two motion controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-Core 2.7 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible Additional Notes: HTC Vive + two Vive controllers / Oculus Rift + two Oculus Touch controllers / Windows Mixed Reality & two motion controllers
